thread.section_title: AirportRentals.com.au Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of AirportRentals.com.au | airportrentals.com.au | 2 of 43
thread.title: Marylyn Broomhall

author: Marylyn Broomhall
title: Marylyn Broomhall
text:
At a time when my stress level was through the roof I found the process of renting the car through Airport Rentals to be seamless.
The booking process was user friendly.
The pick up and drop off easy
And the overall experience enjoyable even under the circumstances.
I will no doubt have to use the service again and I will have no hesitation in booking the car rental through Airport Rentals when I need to.
